original_title: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future: Future Force Training - Skill Level 1
overview: CAPTAIN POWER NEEDS YOU! Prepare for you flight training as one of the Soldiers of the Future! Captain Power himself will take all beginning pilots on a simulated flight mission aboard the PowerJet XT-7 - where you will learn special battle tactics and aerial maneuvers.  WARNING: Lord Dread and his Bio Creads can strike at any time! In case of an unexpected attack, your service may be needed!  (This tape was included in some editions of the XT-7 toy.)
title: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future: Future Force Training - Skill Level 1
